info.description: This swagger doc contain API Definition for API Gateway APIs. It contains swagger definition for all APIs in API Gateway.
info.title: API Gateway APIs

get.description: The method retrieves a list of available gateway scopes in API Gateway.

200.description: This status code indicates that a list of the available gateway scopes are retrieved successfully.

401.description: This status code indicates that either user didn't provide right credentials or user doesn't have required privileges to access this API.

post.description: The method creates a gateway scope in API Gateway.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: This parameter describes the request payload of an gateway scope that is to be created in API Gateway.

200.description: This status code indicates that the gateway scope has been successfully created in API Gateway.

400.description: This status code indicates that an gateway scope with the given ID already exists in API Gateway

401.description: This status code indicates that either user didn't provide right credentials or user doesn't have required privileges to access this API.

delete.description: The method deletes the specified gateway scope in API Gateway.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: This parameter specifies the ID of an gateway scope that is to be deleted in API Gateway.

401.description: This status code indicates that either user didn't provide right credentials or user doesn't have required privileges to access this API.

204.description: This status code indicates that the specified gateway scope has been successfully deleted from API Gateway.

404.description: This status code indicates that an gateway scope with the given ID could not be found in API Gateway.

get.description: The method retrieves the details of a specified gateway scope in API Gateway

parameters.name: gatewayScopeId
parameters.description: This parameter specifies the ID of an gateway scope whose details are to be retrieved in API Gateway.

200.description: This status code indicates that the details of the specified gateway scope are retrieved successfully.

404.description: This status code indicates that an gateway scope with the given ID could not be found in API Gateway.

401.description: This status code indicates that either user didn't provide right credentials or user doesn't have required privileges to access this API.

put.description: The method updates the property details of the specified gateway scope in API Gateway.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: This parameter describes the request payload of an gateway scope that is to be updated in API Gateway.

parameters.name: strategyId
parameters.description: This parameter specifies the ID of an gateway scope that is to be updated in API Gateway.

200.description: This status code indicates that the specified gateway scope been successfully updated in API Gateway.

400.description: This status code indicates that the specified gateway scope could not be updated

401.description: This status code indicates that either user didn't provide right credentials or user doesn't have required privileges to access this API.

Basic.description: API Gateway Administrator and API Gateway provider
